entry.title: [WAW1][Cooling System] - Rack W04B08
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 21, 06:00 - 14:00 UTC

Jun 27, 13:15 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 21/08/2025 06:00 UTC
End time : 21/08/2025 14:00 UTC
Service impact : The cooling system's efficiency could be temporarily impacted for some servers, which could cause a decreased performance during this maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [TH2/PA3][Ovhcloud Connect] - Partner Maintenance Operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 25, 20:00 - 23:00 UTC

Jul 3, 21:06 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our Ovhcloud Connect infrastructure.

Start time : 25/07/2025 20:00 UTC
End time : 25/07/2025 23:00 UTC
Service impact : At one time during our partner's maintenance, the OVHcloud Connect services at TH2 and PA3 will be interrupted for 3 minutes.
Service improvement : A partner need to do some background work on some of its infrastructure's related to Telehouse OVH and EQUINIX PA3 OVH.

Thank you for your understanding.
